data.caption: Rain Industries Limited - Response In Regard To Significant Movement In The Price Of Security

data.caption: Clarification sought from Rain Industries Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Rain Industries Ltd on December 31 2025 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.
